extendedInfo.description: The best Font Installer on Android ! The app is designed to install beautiful fonts on your phone. You can download and use hundreds of fonts to cutify your phone. It 's easy to change system font! Beautiful fonts,Beautiful mood!Do you want let your phone has become distinctive as well as more beautiful?It 's easy to change system font. Integrated hundreds of exquisite lovely font, easily change the system font, the simple change mood! Font blossoms, personalized I dominate! So monotonous phone interface look! Let you have a happy mood every day, love life, love fonts.Font blossoms, personalized I dominate! So monotonous phone interface look! Let you have a happy mood every day.Hundreds of handpicked fonts that works for your phone Be one of the first to get it and surprise your friends with one of these amazing fonts ;)ââââSupport Galaxy S3,S4,Note,Note II without Root change fontââââSelect from hundreds of custom fonts to install system wide! Preview, backup, install from SD card and share your fonts.Change the font, Change your mood!Main functions:1.Support Samsung, XiaoMi (MIUI), Meizu phone perfect replacement font2.Support Htc, Sony, Motolora phone replacement font(Need Root)3.Support to modify the font size, support for custom fonts4.Easy to operateï¼eliminate the tedious steps.5.Automatic backup fonts easily restore the factory font6.Change font size,make size from small to big.PS: This plug-in should work on most Galaxy which has FlipFontÂ® change font without Root. The other phones need to root. PS: This description is let some app which plagiarize description from iFont to know.If you have a Galaxy phone:FIRST OF ALLYou have to check "unknown sources" option.* Go to home screen> settings> applications, and check unknown sources.* If your device contains Flip Font library, You don't have to root your device.* Some Carrier doesn't allow side downloaded application(non-market app). In this case you should root your device to use this utility.HOW TO USE?â¨- Check if your device is SAMSUNG Galaxy series.â¨- Although your device is from SAMSUNG, some network provider(carrier) doesn't allow side downloaded app(non-market app), in this case you should root your galaxy to use "Font For Android"â¨- Run this app, and click a font what you want to use.â¨- Download procedure will be appeared.â¨- After download, install downloaded apk.â¨- After install downloaded apk, go to font setting menu.â¨*Home > Setting > Display > Fontâ¨- If everything ok, you can see a new font name on font list.â¨- Choose a font what you want to use.â¨- Enjoy it.â¨â¨HOW TO UNINSTALL FONTS?â¨- Go to 'Home > Setting > Application > Manage Application'â¨- Select font you want to uninstallâ¨- Follow instructions â¨â¨copyrights,â¨ These fonts are all free ttf fonts.â¨I collect lots of  ttfs and I checked that these fonts are free version.â¨If you find any commercial font on this app, please report me. Then I'll let it down immediately.â¨â¨SEND A FONT WHAT YOU WANT TO USE.â¨I can handle English, Japanese, Chinese and Korean and so on. If you want run some fonts on your Galaxy device, please send your font to me by email.â¨I'll update your font to this app.But don't forget, that font must be free version.â¨When you send a font to me, you should send license information also if possible.Thank you and enjoy it.
